pages.text: $(li)The Deep Lukewarm Ocean is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/water/lukewarm_ocean)Lukewarm Ocean$(/l) that can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)The terrain of this place is composed mainly by Sand blocks. $(br)$(li)You can find some water vegetation too, like Seagrass or Kelp Plants.

$(li)Some aquatic animals like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/dolphin)Dolphins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/squid)Squids$(/l), Cods, $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/pufferfish)Pufferfishes$(/l), Tropical Fishes, $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/frilled_shark)Frilled Sharks$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/hammerhead_shark)Hammerhead Sharks$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Deep Lukewarm Ocean$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
